extendedInfo.description: Doctor Who Sonic Screwdriver Battery Widget!-Displays current battery charge statistics-Plays Sonic Screwdriver sound effect when plugging your device in (can be disabled in settings), and when tapping on the widget.-Select your favorite Doctor's Sonic Screwdriver-2 Models available by default, the 9th/10th Doctors Mark VI and the 11th Doctors Mark VII-Gain access to other screwdrivers from the Doctor's past (Mark I - Mark IV) as well as a TARDIS through In-App Purchase-Also has an alert from a special guest when your battery is getting low!

reviews.title: Please stop the crashing
reviews.comment: I was so excited to have my own sonic screwdriver on my phone... its too bad that within 1 minute of me installing it, it had frozen my entire phone and crashed 3 times. If the crashing stops, I\'d happily give  5 stars
reviews.author: Emily Nixon

reviews.title: Good but....
reviews.comment: Its good i love it but it tends to crash everytime
reviews.author: Solmaz R

reviews.title: Extremely Hindering...
reviews.comment: It\'s neat, but it constantly freezes my phone and brings up an alert saying, \"Sorry, Sonic Screwdriver has stopped working\". In fact, it just froze my phone three times as I wrote this message. And I\'m a fast typer.
reviews.author: delaney frazier

reviews.title: Could be good...
reviews.comment: Concept is awesome, design & function are good BUT.. it \"unexpectedly stops\" way too often (about every 10 minutes)...uninstalling because of this.
reviews.author: Mel Gilliam

reviews.title: OH MY GOD
reviews.comment: somone actually made a doctor who widget
reviews.author: zachary deemer
